query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'app_versions';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user mJX9EQK12biUJGd.0c3e5cf8c922 --database XQsH52MNZAyXrU9qYq4MDw --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'app_versions';
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE
id	int
version	varchar
build_number	int
release_notes	text
download_url	varchar
is_force_update	tinyint
is_active	tinyint
created_at	timestamp
